txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Sleek fur from beasts surrounding Aughaire. Deliver the items to Raith at Aughaire in the south-western reaches of Angmar.
'These will be used for crafting much for our people. Thank you.'
'It may seem strange but the fur of the beasts near our settlement can be used for trims and many other items. We will use what you find.'
Council of the North Task: Sleek Fur
The Hillmen at Aughaire have requested a collection of sleek fur to be delivered to Raith.
Deliver the sleek fur to Raith at Aughaire in Angmar
You have accepted a task to collect and deliver sleek fur from beasts surrounding Aughaire to Raith, a Hillman within the settlement.
Wanted: Sleek fur from beasts surrounding Aughaire.
